mapper.insert: insert into BankTransaction (user_seq, bank_id, deposit, loan) values (#{userSeq}, #{bankId},0,0)
mapper.update: update ssafy_member set days = days+1 and cash = cash + 350 where user_seq = #{userSeq}

update BankTransaction set deposit = deposit + deposit*( select deposit_interest from bank where bank.bank_id = BankTransaction.bank_id ) , loan = loan + loan*( select loan_interest from bank where bank.bank_id = BankTransaction.bank_id ) where user_seq = #{userSeq};
